query: I'm seeking ethnic attire suitable for adults, with a preference for Ishin brand. These outfits are intended for festival wear. The clothing set I'm looking for should include a Navy Blue and golden foil printed top with a round neck and three-quarter sleeves, along with a matching skirt featuring a drawstring closure. Both pieces should be made of pure cotton.

Maroon and golden printed A-line skirt, has a drawstring closure, flared hem
Comes with an ethnic jacket, has a round neck, short sleeves, button closureThe model (height 5'8") is wearing a size STop fabric: Viscose Rayon
Bottom fabric: Viscose Rayon

generations:
Based on your preference for Ishin brand ethnic attire suitable for adults for festival wear, I recommend the Ishin Women Navy Blue & Golden Foil Printed Top with Skirt. This set includes a Navy Blue and golden foil printed top with a round neck and three-quarter sleeves, along with a matching skirt featuring a drawstring closure. Both pieces are made of pure cotton, ensuring comfort and a traditional feel. Product: Ishin Women Navy Blue & Golden Foil Printed Top with Skirt Brand: Ishin Price: 4499.0 Description: Navy Blue and golden foil printed top with round neck, three-quarter sleeves
Matching skirt with drawstring closure
Made of Pure Cotton
Model is wearing a size S
Dry-clean recommended Although the Pannkh Women Maroon & Golden Foil Print Top with Skirt is a beautiful option, it features maroon and golden prints and is made of Viscose Rayon instead of pure cotton. If you are looking specifically for the Navy Blue and golden foil printed set in pure cotton from Ishin, this outfit perfectly fits your requirements for a festival-ready ethnic attire. Enjoy your festival in style with this elegant and comfortable ensemble!
